name: The Endless Darkness
description:
The player awakens in an unknown place surrounded by stone walls. They don't know why but their vision feels weird after they blink and returns to normal after they blink again. They feel as if items appear and disappear depending on this feeling.

Controls: 

WASD - Mode

Space - Jump

Esp - Pause

Tab - Blink

Dev Controls:

E - Complete a level

R - Fail a level
